task.title: Switch deploy script to docker compose and confirm paths
task.author: user

steps.summary: Requested deploy script to use docker compose and to verify path expectations for compose build contexts.
Reviewed scripts/deploy.sh and deploy/docker-compose.yml to confirm sync target and build contexts. Evidence: scripts/deploy.sh, deploy/docker-compose.yml.
Updated deploy script to use docker compose commands and log hint accordingly.

final_summary: Replaced docker-compose CLI usage in deploy.sh with docker compose and confirmed compose build contexts rely on apps/ under the repo root synced to the server path.
